data.title: MARILYN MANSON Signs Deal With NUCLEAR BLAST RECORDS
data.meta_description: Industrial Icon Marilyn Manson Hints at New Music and Record Deal.
data.text:
Industrial Icon Marilyn Manson Hints at New Music and Record Deal

Marilyn Manson, the enigmatic industrial rocker, has sparked speculation of a comeback with a cryptic teaser video. The video, featuring the logos of Manson and veteran metal label Nuclear Blast Records, has fans buzzing about a potential new album and signing.

This news comes on the heels of rumors that Manson had already finished recording new music. His last studio album, “We Are Chaos,” was released in 2020.

The teaser arrives alongside the announcement of Manson‘s upcoming co-headlining tour with FIVE FINGER DEATH PUNCH, kicking off in August 2024. This marks Marilyn Manson‘s return to the stage after a several-year hiatus.

The dates in Silver Spring, Maryland; Chicago, Illinois and Reno, Nevada will be take place around the shock-rocker’s first tour in five years, as direct support to FIVE FINGER DEATH PUNCH.

Marilyn Manson headlining shows:

Aug. 03 – Silver Spring, MD – The Fillmore

Aug. 17 – Chicago, IL – Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom

Sep. 01 – Reno, NV – Grand Theater at Grand Sierra Resort and Casino

It’s important to note that Marilyn Manson has faced legal challenges in recent years, with multiple women accusing him of misconduct. Manson has vehemently denied all allegations and has countersued some of his accusers. Several lawsuits have been dismissed.

Marilyn Manson Faces Legal Battles and Career Stalls

Marilyn Manson, the controversial rock artist known for his shocking stage presence and gothic aesthetic, has found himself embroiled in a series of legal issues over the past few years. Several women, including actress Evan Rachel Wood, have publicly accused Manson (real name Brian Warner) of sexual abuse, emotional manipulation, and physical violence.

Manson has vehemently denied all allegations and has even filed countersuits against some of his accusers. Additionally, some lawsuits against him have been dismissed by judges. However, the accusations have had a significant impact on his career.
